# Link Annotations

**API Collection**

Validate and handle links in a PDF view.

## Linking in a View

- **enableDataDetectors**: A Boolean value indicating whether to turns on or off data detection, which adds annotations for detected URLs in a page.

## Working with Annotation Actions

- **annotationsChanged(on:)**: Tells the PDF view that an annotation on the specified page has changed.

items.description: A Boolean value indicating whether to turns on or off data detection, which adds annotations for detected URLs in a page.
